title: Email painted over
content: I received an email, Thunderbird on my Windows 11 PC, that was heavily covered by an unknown solid black design. Most of the text was covered over. I was unable to remove the blockage. title: email not loaded from server
content:
Hello, I use the Thunderbird to hanlde my 12 email accounts, and it has huge number of emails. My problem, nowadays the client cant download the new emails, many times. I use with Imap setting. If I restart, as "admin" the program, I can see the new emails, but I have to do it many times a day.

Do you have any suggestion, what to do ?

I cant decrase the numbers of the emails, and I like this program, I dont would like to change to other client....

Thanks Laszlo

title: Thunderbird not starting
content:
Last week Thunderbird did an automatic update, this is not unusual BUT since then every time I try to start Thunderbird A message comes up 

"Your computer needs to be restarted to complete a previous upgrade of Thunderbird. Do you want to reboot now? Yes No"

No mater how many times I allow the computer to restart Thunderbird never opens.

I like Thunderbird I is my preferred email reader and writer.

title: Need to export specific data from bulk emails
content:
Hi - I have a batch of a few hundred emails that include names and emails from a form that people filled out. I didn't know how to create a form that collected this information directly into an email list at the time (now I do, thankfully), so now I need to download specific data - name, email - from the body all of those emails into a csv file.

I used Google Takeout to download the specific emails and then imported them into Thunderbird. I used ImportExportTools NG to export the data into a csv file, but the data I need was not included. Is there a way to export data from the body of an email into a csv file?
creator: DogBehaviorNerd

title: Migrating from OSX To windows 11
content:
Thunderbird is working on osx.

Installed and working on windows 11.

Then realised that I could migrate!

Followed this article

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1257585

However there are profiles in both %appdata% and %localdata%

Just copying over the Thunderbird folder from Osx to windows as per

".../AppData/Roaming on Windows, replacing whatever Thunderbird folder that may already exist"

Does not seem to work.

title: SMTP Fastwebnet non funziona più
content: Salve, sono di nuovo io.... Premetto che su Thunderbird, che gestisco sul PC) ho tre caselle di posta: una di GMAIL, una di FASTWEB e una di un sito su ARUBA. Fino a ieri ho avuto un problema con SMTP e GMAIL su Thunderbird (da PC). Ho risolto disinstallando thunderbird (il programma scaricato dalla pagina ufficiale) ed installando l'app da windows 11...ora GMAIL funziona ma ora non funziona più la mia casella Fastwebnet.it. Allego screenshots della configurazione e il messaggio di errore ch mi esce quando tento di inviare un messaggio da quella casella... La casella di posta di Fastweb, da sola sul cellulare e da webmail, funziona ma su Thunderbird no...sto impazzendo da stamattina... HELP! Non so più cosa fare!!!!
creator: santina.boverio

title: Claims User/Pass is incorrect or that i have inproper pop settings.
content: Randomly one day my thunderbird says "Login to server pop.centurylink.net with username vxxxxxxx@gulftel.com failed." My user and password are correct as is my server settings. I contacted centurylink and they told me its on mozillas end and unfortunately mozilla doesnt have a customer service number. I've tried deleting and redownloading Thunderbird, deleting the account and readding it and it still wont let me access it.
creator: vickieaker
